thread.title: Global AutoTrading Integrates with Tradier Inc., to Extend Brokerage Services
thread.title_full: Global AutoTrading Integrates with Tradier Inc., to Extend Brokerage Services - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Global AutoTrading Integrates with Tradier Inc., to Extend Brokerage Services
text:
Innovative autotrading platform integrates with Tradier Brokerage API to enhance trading capabilities and strategy
CHARLOTTE, North Carolina (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Tradier Brokerage, Inc ., today announced that Global AutoTrading has integrated with the Tradier API to extend brokerage capabilities for the autotrading community. As part of the collaboration, investors already relying on Global AutoTrading’s service to quickly act on trade newsletter alerts will gain the ability to automatically submit orders to Tradier Brokerage, Inc. to swiftly and cost-effectively execute a trade.
“Our integration with Tradier allows us to simplify the execution of an equities or options trade,” said Jimmy Talbot, President, Global AutoTrading. “With the unbundling of brokerage services that Tradier provides, we are able to grow our user base and more effectively empower traders with real-time intelligence and more effective trading tools.”
Key Benefits to the Autotrading Investor Community
 Choice – Ability to select multiple newsletters to be traded from a personal account Flexibility – Freedom to allocate different levels of capital to each newsletter Transparency – Monitoring capabilities provide visibility into trading activity, trade confirmations, weekly and monthly reports, and customer account statements Integration – Autotrading can be conducted from existing brokerage accounts Speed – Users benefit from the fastest email alert processing time, allowing for the best fill prices before other traders have time to enter their orders
“Global AutoTrading users represent a growing brigade of innovative traders demanding real-time, intuitive and more flexible trading solutions,” said Craig Russell, Chief Evangelist and SVP of Product at Tradier, Inc . “Our collaboration with Global Autotrading extends our ability to further arm traders with choice, flexibility, and ease-of-use when it comes to brokerage services.”
To learn more about the benefits of the Global AutoTrading integration with the Tradier Brokerage API, visit: https://brokerage.tradier.com/platforms/global-autotrading
For information on Tradier Brokerage, Inc., visit https://brokerage.tradier.com/ , contact us at (980) 272-3880 or engage with us on Twitter @tradier
About Global AutoTrading
Global AutoTrading provides automated trading ("autotrading") of investment newsletters to its clients, allowing clients to quickly act on newsletter alerts while they sleep, work or play. With the integration of Tradier's API, Global AutoTrading is able to quickly and reliably submit orders to Tradier Brokerage, Inc. as communicated by newsletter alerts.
About Tradier Brokerage Inc.
Tradier Brokerage, Inc. a member of FINRA and SIPC is an independent subsidiary of Tradier, Inc. The Brokerage API enables advisors, entrepreneurs, businesses, developers and active traders to solve their trading and brokerage challenges using the independent content and tool providers of their choice – at simple and competitive prices.
About Tradier, Inc.
Tradier, Inc. (tradier.com) is a cloud-based financial services provider and brokerage API company that offers a groundbreaking platform to serve Platform Providers, Advisors, Developers and Individual Investors. Tradier delivers an innovative set of fully hosted API's, modules and "out of the box" tools that are leveraged by a growing list of providers seeking to create innovative trading and investing experiences.
Created by developers, Tradier is a technology linchpin that works with organizations that want to democratize access to data, trade execution, low cost trading and market connectivity through cloud access. In addition, Tradier’s APIs empowers third-party developers and advisors to build applications such as algorithmic and robotic investing and trading offerings.
The Tradier solution features REST-based and Streaming APIs, and turnkey tools that deliver speed, choice and simplicity – all on a secure platform.
For information on Tradier Inc, visit tradier.com or contact us at 980.272.3670.
